org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: RegimenAnalysisActive
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery:
SELECT
linelist.regimenlinetext RegimenLine, linelist.regimentext Regimen,
SUM(IF(age0to4=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 0-4 `, SUM(IF(age0to4=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 0-4 `, SUM(IF(age5to9=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 5-9 `, SUM(IF(age5to9=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 5-9`,
SUM(IF(age10to14=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 10-14`, SUM(IF(age10to14=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 10-14`,
SUM(IF(age15to19=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 15-19`, SUM(IF(age15to19=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 15-19`, SUM(IF(age20to24=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 20-24`, SUM(IF(age20to24=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 20-24`, SUM(IF(age25to29=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 25-29`, SUM(IF(age25to29=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 25-29`, SUM(IF(age30to34=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 30-34`, SUM(IF(age30to34=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 30-34`, SUM(IF(age35to39=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 35-34`, SUM(IF(age35to39=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 39-34`, SUM(IF(age40to44=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 40-44`, SUM(IF(age40to44=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 40-44`, SUM(IF(age45to49=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 45-49`, SUM(IF(age45to49=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 45-49`, SUM(IF(age50above=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Male 50+`, SUM(IF(age50above=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Female 50+`
from
(
select
patient.patient_id,
person.gender as sex,
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) as age,
IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 4,1,0) as age0to4, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) BETWEEN 5 AND 9,1,0) as age5to9, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) BETWEEN 10 AND 14,1,0) as age10to14, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) BETWEEN 15 AND 19,1,0) as age15to19, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) BETWEEN 20 AND 24,1,0) as age20to24, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) BETWEEN 25 AND 29,1,0) as age25to29, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) BETWEEN 30 AND 34,1,0) as age30to34, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) BETWEEN 35 AND 39,1,0) as age35to39, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) BETWEEN 40 AND 44,1,0) as age40to44, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) BETWEEN 45 AND 49,1,0) as age45to49, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) >=50,1,0) as age50above,
getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,curdate())) as regimenlinetext,
getcodedintvalueobs(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,curdate())) as regimenlinecoded,
getcurrentregimen(getcodedintvalueobs(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,curdate())),getencounterid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,curdate()))) as regimentext,
getcodedintvalueobs(
getobswithencounterid( getencounterid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,curdate())) ,getcodedintvalueobs(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,curdate())))) as regimencoded, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,162240,27,curdate())) as lastpickupdate,
IFNULL (getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165470,13,curdate())),getoutcome( getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,162240,27,curdate())), getconceptval(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,162240,27,curdate()),159368,patient.patient_id) , 28, IF(curdate() IS NULL or curdate() = '', CURDATE(),curdate())
)) as statustext
from patient INNER JOIN person on(person.person_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid1 on(pid1.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid1.identifier_type=4 and pid1.voided=0) WHERE patient.voided=0 and pid1.identifier IS NOT NULL ) as linelist where linelist.statustext='Active' GROUP BY linelist.regimenlinecoded,linelist.regimencoded;
